title: Itou Junji: Collection (The Junji Ito Collection)
synopsis: In the light of day and in the dead of night, mysterious horrors await in the darkest shadows of every corner. They are unexplainable, inescapable, and undefeatable. Be prepared, or you may become their next victim.
